ReportSection.title: ATSEC Decision Regarding Merit Increment
ReportSection.ReportItem:
Anthony Singhal
Vice Dean of {$faculty}
Chair, Academic Teaching Staff Evaluation Committee

I am writing to inform you that the Academic Teaching Staff Evaluation Committee (ATSEC) has accepted the recommendation of your Department Chair and awarded you 0C, as your academic performance while on authorized leave could not be properly evaluated.

I would like to take this opportunity to thank you for your work this past year, and to wish you continued success in your teaching.

Should you have any procedural questions, please contact {get(hrEmail)}.

Sincerely,


Anthony Singhal
Vice Dean of {$faculty}
Chair of the Academic Teaching Staff Evaluation Committee
